ygData.subject: Re: New patch message
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From:  To:  Sent: Wednesday, August 25, 1999 9:23 AM Subject: Re: [eqbards] New patch message ... going ... have
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: <jhenders@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 25, 1999 9:23 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] New patch message


> From: jhenders@...
>
> On Wed, Aug 25/99, JasonF <JasonF@...> wrote:
> >
> > I don't know either. I broke a level last night and several skills were
going
> > up and I didn't see any difference in the messages being printed. "You
have
> > become better at percussion and now pass other players even more quickly
using
> > Selo's Accelerando (84)." I expected (84/200) or something. So I
switched to
> > the Skills screen hoping that instead of "Feeble" my fishing would be
shown as
> > "Feeble 12/200", but nope... Anyone know where they hid the one thing
that
> > they *did* document?
>
> Typically, the stuff they do document doesn't often work. Such as the
> invisibility flashing before it wears off as they documented in the last
> patch. Perhaps that's the case here.
>
>

Actually, I did notice something with my shaman. I maxed alteration for
level 11 at 60, then a few minutes later, I got "you have become better at
alteration (60)" again.

At least, I'm pretty sure that actually happened, I was tired :)
